item.title: More delta questions!
item.dc:creator: @OwnageDBOW OwnageDBOW
item.description:
@OwnageDBOW wrote:

  1. What do I edit to chane the GFX?

} setAnimation(GetWepAnim(playerEquipment[playerWeapon])); if(UseCrossBow && misc.random(5)==1 && playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 881){ hitDiff = misc.random(maxRangeHit2()) + misc.random(30); stillgfx(197, EnemyY, EnemyX); actionInterval = getbattleTimer(); lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); }

  1. When it said Misc.Random(30) Would that be itâ€™s max hit?

} setAnimation(GetWepAnim(playerEquipment[playerWeapon])); if(UseCrossBow && misc.random(5)==1 && playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 881){ hitDiff = misc.random(maxRangeHit2()) + misc.random(30); stillgfx(197, EnemyY, EnemyX); actionInterval = getbattleTimer(); lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); }
